"Unlock Sign Collection Trials":
"In these Trials, your goal is to collect as many Unlock Signs as possible within the time limit.

Touching an Unlock Sign will earn you Exploration Points. There are three sizes of Unlock Sign: Small, Medium and Large. The larger the sign, the more Exploration Points you earn."
"At the end of the Trial, all players in the Room will earn additional Exploration Points based on how many Exploration Points they were able to obtain from Unlock Signs during the Trial."
